message:
SYSTEM: 01a.FormalismosRepresentaci%C3%B3n.pdf: Página 7
Semantic Network. Basic elements 
• 
Nodes 
•  They represent entities or concepts, or values 
• 
Edges 
•  They represent properties or relations 
• 
The semantics (mapping to the real world) depends on the tags 
used for nodes and edges 
• 
There is no predefined KR vocabulary 
•  Although sometimes there are structural edges 
Entity/Concept 
Node 
Node 
property/relation 
Value 
Entity 
Concept 
instanceOf 
Concept 
Concept 
subclassOf
